project.name: Universe Traders
project.description: Trade across the whole universe in your browser!

Universe.name: Universe
Universe.description:
Represents the universe as seen by the player. Controls the ship
and planets movement.

classitems.description:
Stops the movement of the Ship. After calling this method, user can't move
the Ship anymore. Used for example when Dialog is showed.
classitems.name: stopMovement

classitems.description: Starts handling the Ship movement again.
classitems.name: continueMovement

classitems.description: Resets (reinitializes) the universe. Used when restarting the game.
classitems.name: reset

classitems.description: Saves the Universe (including the Ship and Objects) to localStorage.
classitems.name: save

classitems.description:
Loads the Universe (including the Ship and Objects) from localStorage.
Calls this.onGameLoaded() when finished.
classitems.name: load

classitems.description: Loads the map of the Universe. Also calls this.load() when map is loaded.
classitems.name: loadMap

classitems.description: Moves the Ship (center of the screen) to the defined coordinates.
classitems.name: moveToMapPoint

classitems.description: Moves the Ship (center of the screen) to the global coordinates (pixels).
classitems.name: moveToGlobalPoint

classitems.description: Moves the Ship (center of the screen) to the MapObject.
classitems.name: moveToObject

classitems.description:
Handles 'click' event. Moves the ship (center of the screen) to coordinates
defined by click.
classitems.name: click

classitems.description: Sets the current object which is under the Ship.

params.name: object
params.description: MapObject under the ship or null.

classitems.name: setCurrentObject

classitems.description:
Updates the universe. This is the main looping method of the game called
on every tick.

params.name: dt
params.description: Time elapsed since the previous execution of this method.

classitems.name: update

classitems.description: Called when all the objects on the map are loaded.
classitems.name: objectsLoaded
